    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109151</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109151</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Distance and displacement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand und Distanzadresse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distance et déplacement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distância e deslocamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distanza e spostamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόσταση και μετατόπιση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Distancia y dislocación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This map shows the path taken by hikers during a hike. The distance that they travelled (arrows) is longer than their displacement (actual distance from start to finish).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">displacement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hikers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Map</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scalars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vectors</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karte zeigt den Pfad, der von den Wanderern
während einer Wanderung genommen wird. Der Abstand, daß sie 
(Pfeile) sind länger reisten, als ihre Distanzadresse (tatsächlicher
Abstand von Anfang zu Ende).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette carte montre la voie d'accès prise par des 
randonneurs pendant une hausse. La distance qu'ils ont voyagé 
(des flèches) est plus long que leur déplacement (distance réelle 
de début à la finition).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este mapa mostra o trajeto feito exame por hikers
durante um hike. A distância que viajaram (setas) são mais 
longos do que seu deslocamento (distância real do começo ao 
revestimento).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma mostra il percorso preso dai 
hikers durante l'aumento. La distanza che hanno viaggiato 
(frecce) sono più lunghe del loro spostamento (distanza reale fra 
l'inizio e rivestimento).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο χάρτης εμφανίζει το μονοπάτι που λαμβάνεται 
από τους οδοιπόρους κατά τη διάρκεια ενός πεζοπορώ. Η 
απόσταση που ταξίδεψαν (βέλη) είναι μεγαλύτερη από τη 
μετατόπισή τους (πραγματική απόσταση από την έναρξη που 
τελειώνει).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta correspondencia muestra el camino tomado por
los hikers durante un alza. La distancia que viajaron (las 
flechas) son más larga que su dislocación (distancia real del 
comienzo al final).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Distanzadresse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wanderer</string>
          </keyword>
